name: graph-visualization-pbl
description: Interactive graph visualization and pathfinding tool for Data Structures PBL course

scripts.build-backend: cd backend/src && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/generator generator.cpp graph.cpp && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/dijkstra dijkstra.cpp graph.cpp minheap.cpp && chmod +x ../build/generator && chmod +x ../build/dijkstra
scripts.build-backend-windows: cd backend\src && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ..\build\generator.exe generator.cpp graph.cpp && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ..\build\dijkstra.exe dijkstra.cpp graph.cpp minheap.cpp
scripts.build-backend-linux: cd backend/src && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/generator generator.cpp graph.cpp && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/dijkstra dijkstra.cpp graph.cpp minheap.cpp && chmod +x ../build/generator && chmod +x ../build/dijkstra
scripts.build-backend-mac: cd backend/src && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/generator generator.cpp graph.cpp && g++ -std=c++11 -I. -o ../build/dijkstra dijkstra.cpp graph.cpp minheap.cpp && chmod +x ../build/generator && chmod +x ../build/dijkstra
scripts.clean: rm -rf data/saved_graphs/*.json data/graph.json data/route.json data/graph_input.json data/route_input.json
scripts.clean-windows: if exist data\saved_graphs\*.json del data\saved_graphs\*.json && if exist data\*.json del data\*.json

author: DS PBL Project
